languages.text: "Этот ответ делает вам честь. Только истинному праведнику будет столь нестерпимо само обвинение в ереси". {n}Арджента кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Этот ответ делает вам честь. Истинному праведнику нестерпима и самая мимолетная мысль о ереси". {n}Арджента кивает.{/n}

languages.text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Этот ответ делает вам честь. Только истинному праведнику будет столь нестерпимо само обвинение в ереси". {n}Арджента кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "That answer does you credit. One truly righteous cannot bear even a fleeting thought of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}
"That answer does you credit. One truly righteous cannot bear even a fleeting thought of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}
"That answer does you credit. One the truly righteous cannot bear even a fleeting thought of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}
"That answer does you credit. One the truly righteous cannot bear even a fleeting thought of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}
"That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

languages.text: “这个答案很有说服力，真正的正义之人绝不会容忍异端论调。”{n}阿洁塔点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个答案很有说服力。真正的正义之人绝不会容忍异端论调，哪怕是转瞬即逝的想法也不例外。”{n}阿洁塔点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: «Esa respuesta le honra. Solo los verdaderos fieles reaccionan con tal fervor ante una acusación de herejía». {n}Argenta asiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa respuesta le hace honor. Los verdaderos fieles no toleran ni el más mínimo pensamiento herético». {n}Argenta asiente.{/n}

languages.text: 「その答えは賞賛に値する。異端の告発にこれほど激しく反応するのは、真に正しき者だけだ」{n}アルジェンタはうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その答えは賞賛に値する。真に正しき人は、異端者の考えが頭をよぎることさえ耐えられない」 {n}アルジェンタは、うなずく。{/n}
「その答えは賞賛に値する。異端の告発にこれほど激しく反応するのは、真に正しき者だけだ」{n}アルジェンタはうなずく。{/n}

languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette réponse vous honore. Seule une personne réellement juste réagirait aussi vivement à une accusation d'hérésie, » {n}déclare Argenta en hochant la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette réponse vous honore. Seule une personne réellement juste réagirait aussi vivement à une accusation d'hérésie, » {n}déclare Argenta en hochant la tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Antwort gereicht Euch zur Ehre. Nur wer wahrhaft rechtschaffen ist, würde sich vom Vorwurf der Ketzerei derart provozieren lassen." {n}Argenta nickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Antwort gereicht Euch zur Ehre. Nur die wahrhaft Rechtschaffenen ertragen nicht einmal einen flüchtigen Vorwurf der Ketzerei." {n}Argenta nickt.{/n}

languages.text: "Cevabın, doğruyu söylediğinin kanıtı. Kâfirlik ithamı, yalnızca erdemlilerin yüreğini böylesi bir öfkeyle kaplar." {n}Argenta, başıyla onaylıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That answer does you credit. Only the truly righteous would be so provoked by the accusation of heresy." {n}Argenta nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cevabın, doğruyu söylediğinin kanıtı. Kâfirlik ithamı, yalnızca erdemlilerin yüreğini böylesi bir öfkeyle kaplar." {n}Argenta, başıyla onaylıyor.{/n}
